coffee.name: Death Wish Bean
coffee.description: Premium dark roast for those who love a powerful start. Rich cocoa aroma, dense body, and a confident finish that keeps its character with milk or sugar.

coffee.name: AROMISTICO Coffee 1 kg
coffee.description: Smooth everyday blend with a refined aroma and delicate chocolate sweetness. A dependable choice for your daily ritual with a clean, balanced taste.

coffee.name: Solimo Coffee Beans 2 kg
coffee.description: Signature medium roast with bright fruity notes and a polished finish. Crafted for consistent flavor in every cup, from morning brew to afternoon refill.

coffee.name: Black Rifle Coffee
coffee.description: Bold roast with smoky caramel accents and a full-bodied profile. Ideal when you want expressive flavor, strong aroma, and caf√©-style intensity at home.

coffee.name: Presto Coffee Beans 1 kg
coffee.description: Classic medium roast with soft vanilla notes and a warm toasted finish. Balanced and versatile, it delivers a smooth premium cup for any brewing method.

coffee.name: Organic Coffee One Cup
coffee.description: Organic single-serve coffee with a gentle floral aroma and clean finish. Convenient format, premium taste, and a light elegant profile for everyday enjoyment.

goods.name: Electric Spice and Coffee Grinder
goods.description: Compact electric grinder with stainless steel blades for fast, even grinding. Perfect for coffee beans and spices when you need consistent results in seconds.

goods.name: Manual Coffee Grinder
goods.description: Portable hand grinder with adjustable grind size for espresso, moka, and filter. Ideal for home brewing and travel when you want full control over flavor.

goods.name: Coffee Cup with Lid
goods.description: Double-wall travel cup with secure lid that keeps drinks hot longer. A practical daily companion for commuting, work, and coffee on the go.
